text: Jorge Rivera Galindo (born October 28, 1978 in Puerto Tejada, Cauca, Colombia) is a Colombian footballer currently playing for León de Huánuco of the Primera División in Peru. ==Teams== * Real Cartagena 1999 * Alcides Vigo 2000–2002 * Estudiantes de Medicina 2003 * Unión Huaral 2004–2006 * Alianza Atlético 2007–2008 * O'Higgins 2009 * Juan Aurich 2010 * Sport Huancayo 2011 * Alianza Lima 2012 * León de Huánuco 2013–present ==Titles== * Real Cartagena 1999 (Primera B Colombian) * Alcides Vigo 2001 (Segunda División Peruana) ==References== * Profile at BDFA Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Alianza Lima footballers Category:Peruvian Primera División players Category:Peruvian Segunda División players Category:Categoría Primera B players Category:Alianza Atlético footballers Category:Juan Aurich footballers Category:Unión Huaral footballers Category:Sport Huancayo footballers Category:León de Huánuco footballers Category:Club Alcides Vigo footballers Category:Estudiantes de Medicina footballers Category:Real Cartagena footballers Category:O'Higgins F.C. footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Chile Category:Expatriate footballers in Peru Category:Expatriate footballers in Colombia Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Jorge Rivera Galindo
